directions: Heat cream and chocolate in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula until chocolate is melted; remove from heat and cool.
Blend cooled chocolate mixture, sweetened condensed milk, rum, coffee granules, cinnamon, vanilla extract, and coconut extract together in a blender on high speed until smooth.
ingredients: 1 (2.6 ounce) bar milk chocolate candy bar
title: Coconut Rum Cream
